translation: Destroy all the towers.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Destroy all the towers.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Southern tower destroyed!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Southern tower destroyed!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Eastern tower destroyed!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Eastern tower destroyed!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Western tower destroyed!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Western tower destroyed!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Northern tower destroyed!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Northern tower destroyed!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: All towers destroyed!{#Name="説明文"}
source: All towers destroyed!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: Enemy in sight! All teams into position!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Enemy in sight! All teams into position!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: That's no mirage, you fools! That's her! The demon Intoner!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: That's no mirage, you fools! That's her! The demon Intoner!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Dammit! This sand keeps getting in my eyes!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Dammit! This sand keeps getting in my eyes!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: 砂埃でよく見えないぞ！{#Name="兵士D"}
source: 砂埃でよく見えないぞ！{#Name="兵士D"}

translation: 3rd Squadron annihilated!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: 3rd Squadron annihilated!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Run for the hills! We can't possibly stand against an honest-to-God Intoner!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Run for the hills! We can't possibly stand against an honest-to-God Intoner!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Requesting rear support!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Requesting rear support!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: No way... Is that really her!?{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: No way... Is that really her!?{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Captain, get down!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Captain, get down!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: It's too dangerous here! Move it!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: It's too dangerous here! Move it!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Attack! Attack! No falling back!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Attack! Attack! No falling back!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: May the souls of our great heroes guide us!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: May the souls of our great heroes guide us!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Gah! My eyes!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Gah! My eyes!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: This is the homeland of our ancestors. We mustn't waiver here!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: This is the homeland of our ancestors. We mustn't waiver here!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: This is the homeland of our ancestors. We mustn't waiver here!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: This is the homeland of our ancestors. We mustn't waiver here!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: That damned, twisted Intoner!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: That damned, twisted Intoner!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: 俺達の超絶秘技を見せてやるッ！{#Name="兵士Ｄ"}
source: 俺達の超絶秘技を見せてやるッ！{#Name="兵士Ｄ"}

translation: Let's go!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Let's go!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Stay close to the captain and follow me!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Stay close to the captain and follow me!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Keep your head down before she cuts the damn thing off!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Keep your head down before she cuts the damn thing off!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: *Huff, huff, huff...* No! I don't wanna die!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: *Huff, huff, huff...* No! I don't wanna die!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: It's Zero! Kill her! Kill the demon!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: It's Zero! Kill her! Kill the demon!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Tear the wicked Intoner apart!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Tear the wicked Intoner apart!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: This is it for me... But I'm going to go down fighting!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: This is it for me... But I'm going to go down fighting!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: I'm with you!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: I'm with you!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Here we go!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Here we go!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: She may be an Intoner, but she can still die!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: She may be an Intoner, but she can still die!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: We've got men down here!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: We've got men down here!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Argh... Dammit!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Argh... Dammit!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: If I die here...please...take this to my sister...{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: If I die here...please...take this to my sister...{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Take it to her yourself, fool! We're not dying here!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Take it to her yourself, fool! We're not dying here!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: 指輪だよ。アイツ、もうすぐ結婚するんだッ{#Name="兵士Ｃ"}
source: 指輪だよ。アイツ、もうすぐ結婚するんだッ{#Name="兵士Ｃ"}

translation: Take it to her yourself, fool! We're not dying here!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Take it to her yourself, fool! We're not dying here!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: I'll take the Intoner myself!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: I'll take the Intoner myself!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Hey! Don't get yourself killed!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Hey! Don't get yourself killed!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: April the 16th, 1000 A.D.{#Name="Accord"}
source: April the 16th, 1000 A.D.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: The Land of Sands.{#Name="Accord"}
source: The Land of Sands.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Is this what's been interfering{LF}with our mental link?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Is this what's been interfering{LF}with our mental link?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The magic from those four towers is{LF}making the interference stronger!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: The magic from those four towers is{LF}making the interference stronger!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Guess we've no choice but to destroy 'em all.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Guess we've no choice but to destroy 'em all.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Don't worry. We can do this, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Don't worry. We can do this, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: What're your disciples up to?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: What're your disciples up to?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: No idea. I let 'em go. They're useless right now.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No idea. I let 'em go. They're useless right now.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...That's really mean, Zero.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: ...That's really mean, Zero.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: What do you want? They'd be too heavy{LF}for you anyway.{#Name="Zero"}
source: What do you want? They'd be too heavy{LF}for you anyway.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Besides, you know how they are.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Besides, you know how they are.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Probably out lazily hunting for food,{LF}not giving a damn about us.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Probably out lazily hunting for food,{LF}not giving a damn about us.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hunting, huh? I wonder if they'll bring{LF}back my favorite!?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hunting, huh? I wonder if they'll bring{LF}back my favorite!?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: You eat rotten meat, dummy.{LF}You don't have a favorite.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You eat rotten meat, dummy.{LF}You don't have a favorite.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: What!? That's mean!{LF}I do so have favorites, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: What!? That's mean!{LF}I do so have favorites, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Oh, you do, do you? Like what?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Oh, you do, do you? Like what?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Liiike...rotten meat?{LF}And...um...almost-rotten meat?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Liiike...rotten meat?{LF}And...um...almost-rotten meat?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Pffft.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Pffft.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'm a good dragon, Zero!{LF}I'm not a picky eater!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I'm a good dragon, Zero!{LF}I'm not a picky eater!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Your palate's gotta be pretty screwed up{LF}to enjoy rotten meat the way you do.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Your palate's gotta be pretty screwed up{LF}to enjoy rotten meat the way you do.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: My palate? Hey, what's wrong with my palate!?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: My palate? Hey, what's wrong with my palate!?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Don't you like my palate, Zero?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Don't you like my palate, Zero?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Well, you're not exactly a gourmet.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Well, you're not exactly a gourmet.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: What's a gourmet?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: What's a gourmet?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Um... Well, someone like Michael, I guess.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Um... Well, someone like Michael, I guess.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Michael was a gourmet with a good palate?{LF}Like how?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Michael was a gourmet with a good palate?{LF}Like how?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: He was...particular. Got mad{LF}any time I changed his diet.{#Name="Zero"}
source: He was...particular. Got mad{LF}any time I changed his diet.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Wow...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Wow...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: And he'd only eat food that was perfectly fresh.{#Name="Zero"}
source: And he'd only eat food that was perfectly fresh.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: If it was overripe? Even a little? Forget it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: If it was overripe? Even a little? Forget it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Even if he was hungry?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Even if he was hungry?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Oh yeah. He'd go days without eating if he had to.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Oh yeah. He'd go days without eating if he had to.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Wow! Awesome!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Wow! Awesome!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Trust me. Awesome is not the{LF}word you're looking for.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Trust me. Awesome is not the{LF}word you're looking for.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It must be really hard to make{LF}food for a gourmet, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: It must be really hard to make{LF}food for a gourmet, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Heh. You have no idea. If Michael didn't like{LF}something, he'd be sure to let me know about it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Heh. You have no idea. If Michael didn't like{LF}something, he'd be sure to let me know about it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But at least it helped make me a better cook.{#Name="Zero"}
source: But at least it helped make me a better cook.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So are you good now? Are you the best cook ever?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: So are you good now? Are you the best cook ever?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: What do you care? You eat rotten meat, remember?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What do you care? You eat rotten meat, remember?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: There's no point in even trying with you.{#Name="Zero"}
source: There's no point in even trying with you.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Aww, that's mean!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Aww, that's mean!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Hey, tell me more about Michael!{LF}Please, please, pleeease? I wanna know more!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hey, tell me more about Michael!{LF}Please, please, pleeease? I wanna know more!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I... I forgot the rest.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I... I forgot the rest.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Awwwww!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Awwwww!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I'll try to make my palate better for you, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I'll try to make my palate better for you, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Huh?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Huh?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I've gotta try extra hard if I wanna{LF}be strong like Michael!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I've gotta try extra hard if I wanna{LF}be strong like Michael!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Oh, right. Well, good luck with that.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Oh, right. Well, good luck with that.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But, you know it's fine if you're{LF}not a gourmet, right?{#Name="Zero"}
source: But, you know it's fine if you're{LF}not a gourmet, right?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It is?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: It is?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Yeah. Then I can feed you any old slop I find{LF}lying around. That's way easier for me.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah. Then I can feed you any old slop I find{LF}lying around. That's way easier for me.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Aw, come on! That's just humiliating!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Aw, come on! That's just humiliating!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Huh. That's a pretty big word for you.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Huh. That's a pretty big word for you.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: We did it!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: We did it!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Now we can go back! We can go back and see everyone again!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Now we can go back! We can go back and see everyone again!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Yeah. That's the last thing I need right now.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah. That's the last thing I need right now.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Huh? Don't you want to see everyone? You must!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Huh? Don't you want to see everyone? You must!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: No, actually. I don't.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No, actually. I don't.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I really don't.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I really don't.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: This concludes the supplemental repairs made to recording M4510_E0900_FL.{#Name="Accord"}
source: This concludes the supplemental repairs made to recording M4510_E0900_FL.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Please ensure that such mistakes do not occur again.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Please ensure that such mistakes do not occur again.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: With this, all conditions have now been met.{#Name="Accord"}
source: With this, all conditions have now been met.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Now all that remains...is Branch D.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Now all that remains...is Branch D.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: The final record of the singularity known as Zero.{#Name="Accord"}
source: The final record of the singularity known as Zero.{#Name="Accord"}
